title: Father shoots, kills his 3 children inside Sacramento County church before killing self, officials say - KCRA Sacramento
content:
1. Father shoots, kills his 3 children inside Sacramento County church before killing self, officials say  KCRA Sacramento
  2. California church shooting: Dad kills 3 kids, turns gun on himself, police say  Fox News
  3. Father Kills Three Children, One Adult In Shooting At California Church  NBC News
  4. Man who shot his 3 kids at church had restraining order  The Mercury News
  5. A father killed 3 of his kids and an adult before killing himself at a church near Sacramento, authorities say  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Sacramento County Sheriff's Office said the gunman shot and killed his three children before shooting and killing himself. There is also a fifth victim with unknown ties.
